content.notes: Content not refactored in Phase 1; original preserved under payload.

layout_template.notes: Layout based on the Africa_ADayInTheLife.jpg draft (layout reference only; character content corrected from new_prompts.xlsx + Africa.docx).

header.notes: Handwritten/script title at top-left over a muted world-map background.

grid.notes: Each character row = left info panel + 6 image cards. Each card has a square photo above a short caption.

characters.name: Naserian

label.headline: Naserian
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Naserian is a 12-year-old Maasai girl from Kenya. The Maasai people are known for their distinctive customs, dress (such as the bright red shuka cloth), and residence near game parks in the African Great Lakes region.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: The cowâ€™s flank is warm against my hands, and the crisp morning smells like grass and milk.

keywords: Child with cattle in African savanna

characters.name: Imani

label.headline: Imani
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Imani is a 30-year-old entrepreneur in Kigali, Rwanda. Rwandan culture is characterized by strong family values, community engagement, and respect for elders.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Mist brushes my cheeks as I run; each breath fuels fresh ideas for the day ahead.

characters.name: Kandu

label.headline: Kandu
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Kandu is a 15-year-old boy from the Himba tribe in northern Namibia. The Himba are a semi-nomadic people known for their distinctive red ochre covering their skin and hair, traditional leather clothing, and intricate hairstyles.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I balance the cool pot, feeling sunrise heat spread across the quiet sand.
